name: Delay
description: Inspired by Superhot, Delay is a fast-paced action platformer in which the player must manipulate time to cheat death and defeat their enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: N/A Storage: 37 MB available space Sound Card: ASUS Xonar DSX PCIe 7.1 GX2.5 Additional Notes: This game uses very minimal system resources.
